text: Britta Schall Caroc Holberg (25 July 1941 – 23 February 2022) was a Danish politician. She was a member of the Venstre party. She was Minister of the Interior from 1982 to 1986, Minister for Agriculture from 1986 to 1987, and was a member of the Folketing from 1984 to 1988 and again from 2005 to 2011. Holberg was born in Glumsø, Denmark. Holberg died on 23 February 2022 in Copenhagen, Denmark at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Danish politicians
title: Britta Schall Holberg
